name: The Handheld Game Console Encyclopedia vol.2
name_original: The Handheld Game Console Encyclopedia vol.2
description:
The book/PDF cover the handheld game consoles; Microvision, Adventure Vision, Colorvision, Supervision, and R-Zone.

The PDF include every game title,  including different unreleased games , accessories (if released),  among other things. Pages consist of screenshots, information and cover art for every game.

around 140 pages

Microvision - 18 pages
Adventure Vision - 11 pages
Colorvision - 11 pages
Supervision - 67 pages
R-Zone - 26 pages

Please download preview PDF first.

Text and pictures are taken from different sources found online.
